attributes.action: to intoduce an amnesty for illegal immigrants with no criminal records
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reports show that there are 570 000 illegal immigrants in the counrty who are contributing about £1bn annually in taxes it would be a good idea to regularrise all that currently do not have criminal records rather than ponder on how to deport them at the tax payers expense. this is the only EU country that has not had an amnesty. Please authorise an amnesty for those that want to make good what is wrong

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
